attributes.action: To support the people of Palestine ,supporting peace between them and Israel.
attributes.additional_details:
Palestine,  especially Gaza need supplies,  fresh food and medicines.  
We want you to create safe passage of trucks of aid. 
There needs to be a guarantee of safety of medical professionals.  
Pointless deaths are happening because of hunger.
attributes.background:
Countries need to make a stand against the pointless killings and we need Britain to do this, we need to lead by example.
We need to demand peace, food and aid deliveries.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Urgently fulfil humanitarian obligations to Gaza 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700682

Recognise Palestine as a State and seek immediate ceasefire in Gaza
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727717
